title: Gather Requirements (Revised)
description: Conduct user research and stakeholder interviews to understand the problem space, user needs, and desired features for the PersonalizedAdMemorySupressor system. Additionally, research ethical and legal considerations, potential unintended consequences of such a system, and examine existing solutions in this field. The gathered data will be compiled into a comprehensive report and presented to the team for further discussion.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the PersonalizedAdMemorySupressor system, including components, data flows, integration points with other systems, security considerations, scalability/performance requirements, and provide a clear roadmap for each component's development. Also, ensure compatibility with existing privacy regulations and prepare for future updates.

title: Develop Ad Memory Suppression Algorithm
description: Research and develop the core algorithm for selectively suppressing memories of advertisements based on user preferences and psychological principles.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the PersonalizedAdMemorySupressor system, allowing users to configure their preferences and view suppression statistics.

title: Implement Data Storage and Retrieval
description: Design and implement the data storage and retrieval mechanisms for user preferences, advertisement data, and suppression logs.

title: Integrate with Advertising Networks
description: Develop interfaces and APIs to integrate the PersonalizedAdMemorySupressor system with various advertising networks and platforms.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to data privacy regulations and implement appropriate security measures to protect user data and preferences.

title: Develop Testing Strategy
description:
Create a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests, focusing on both functional and non-functional aspects. This will ensure the system's reliability and effectiveness in suppressing memories of advertisements.

**Note:** To optimize the testing process, consider employing test-driven development (TDD) methodology. This involves writing tests before the code implementation to guide the coding process.

title: Prepare Deployment and Monitoring
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring tools for the PersonalizedAdMemorySupressor system. This includes configuring CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and setting up necessary monitoring and alerting systems to ensure smooth operation.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the PersonalizedAdMemorySupressor system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
